message: I added a 'viewport' metatag to the ktest.heroku.com app. This changes the page width when viewed on the iphone or ipod touch.
Also, you can run your own ktest app on heroku (or locally using ruby).
Don't know ktest? It allows you to quickly run KRL rulesets. It runs the dev version, you just give it the rid. Here's an example: http://ktest.heroku.com/a421x70
The source is available on https://github.com/rsbohn/ktest
Many thanks for sharing the source, very nice
